alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:08PM AKST until December 29 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW RETURNS TO HAINES AND THE HIGHWAY... .Light to moderate snow will return to Haines late tonight as a surface low lifts north through the Panhandle. Snow is expected through Thursday night before changing to rain Friday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO 3 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to 3 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow is expected Thursday afternoon. Highest amounts are expected near Haines Custom Station.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
